attributes.action: Force fuel retailers to reduce the price of diesel faster in rural areas and sell it at the same price as petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel retailers are keeping the price of diesel higher in rural areas than in cities .
The price of diesel at the pumps is as much as £0.18p per liter more than petrol, yet petrol prices fall faster than diesel ones
